items.sentence: He wrote down the name so he wouldn\'t forget it.
Tom really enjoys talking with Mary, doesn\'t he?
We have no plans to replace Tom after he retires.
We have to stop Tom before he hurts anybody else.
You don\'t have to help us if you don\'t want to.
Tom and Mary almost always agree with each other.
One thing Tom hates is not being taken seriously.
I wonder how long it\'ll be before Tom gets here.
A taxi to the airport costs about thirty dollars.
Advertising is the driving force behind commerce.
